Question
========
  
The null hypothesis H0: $\mu$ = 14 is tested unilaterally at an $alpha$ of 1% using a random sample of n = 100. An increase of 1.5 points is expected (the expectation is that $\mu$ = 15.5). It is assumed that $$sigma$= 4.5. What is the power of the key to make this $\mu$ find?
